name: Duolingo low contrast
description: Avoid the use of white everywhere.
additional_info:
*Release 1.2* Lesson completed screen is now white. Fixed lesson result back to white after Duolingo update.

*Release 1.1* Updated class name

*Release 1* I'm not an experienced style writer. But, I think this style is going to break the minute Duolingo's designers change the class names. Which seem random generated.
